name: The Dungeon of Malfornoor
description:
This is my first time making a horror game, overall my first game in First person that  I have made. its still in Alpha Build, which means that a lot of stuff could still be buggy or missing stuff, textures messed up or whatever. 

This Game is supposed to be a little of a Puzzle

It has a few jump scares, horrific images, sounds

Your a Person who went into the forest, Seeking after some magical coins, used for summoning the unexpected... but your missing a coin & went into the forest during the night to find it. but something happened. and now your stuck in a basement & and all of your coins are gone.
